entry.title: Introduction
entry.content:
Greetings! 👋🏻 Welcome to my homepage.

About me

I received my bachelor degree of Vehicle engineering , College of Automotive and Mechanical Engineering, The Changsha University of Science and Technology.

My research focuses on Machine Learning, specifically the area of Intelligent transportation and Autonomous driving.

Educations

  • Changsha University of Science and Technology
    Bachelor in Vehicle Engineering, from August 2018 to June 2022.
  • GPA: 3.42/4.0. Ranking:3/132

Publications

  • Modeling and Analysis of Buffer System in Electromagnetic Riveter
    Zhihui Fu, Yunkai Huang, Xu Zhang, Mengjia Li.
    Mechanical Engineering and Technology, 2021, 10(3) .
    [paper]

Selected Honours

  • Outstanding Graduate
    2022, Changsha University of Science and Technology.

National Encouragement Scholarship 2021, Hunan Department of Education.

First Prize Scholarship 2021, Changsha University of Science and Technology.

Merit Student 2021, Changsha University of Science and Technology.

National Encouragement Scholarship 2020, Hunan Department of Education.

First Prize Scholarship 2020, Changsha University of Science and Technology.

Merit Student 2020, Changsha University of Science and Technology.

Third Prize Scholarship 2019, Changsha University of Science and Technology.
